1.event_info: New information generated and sent to opinion leaders

fields.name: information_content
fields.description: The content of the new information generated by the media agent.

fields.name: target_opinion_leaders
fields.description: List of opinion leader agents targeted to receive the information.

2.event_info: Filtered and modified information sent to the public

fields.name: original_information
fields.description: The original information received from the media agent.

fields.name: modified_information
fields.description: The modified version of the information after filtering by opinion leaders.

fields.name: opinion_leader_id
fields.description: Identifier of the opinion leader agent who modified the information.

fields.name: target_public_agents
fields.description: List of public agents targeted to receive the modified information.

3.event_info: Public has received and reacted to information, completing the workflow

fields.name: received_information
fields.description: The information received by the public agent.

fields.name: public_agent_reaction
fields.description: The reaction or response of the public agent upon receiving the information.

fields.name: completion_status
fields.description: Status indicating the completion of the information dissemination process.
